original_text: In fact, the law requires that nearly everything be cleansed with blood, and without the shedding of blood there is no forgiveness.
korean_text: 율법을 따라 거의 모든 물건이 피로써 정결하게 되나니 피흘림이 없은즉 사함이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: that nearly everything be cleansed with blood
sentences.korean_translation: 거의 모든 것이 피로 정결케 되어야 한다고

sentences.original_text: and without the shedding of blood
